name: slime.exe
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 97 and Virtual Pet Jam

Theme 1: Simulation

Theme 2: In The Zone

Limitation: Movement Is Lethal

Push around your little pet slime simulation to... rob banks? Slide your slime around inside virtual places to steal money from banks while also keeping your slime's needs high. Do multiple heists in a row without sleeping to get a money multiplier. How much money can you steal away from banks with your little virtual slime?

Download game for a better audio experience because Godot's browser audio is whack
